subject: Fashion
title: How Color Fades Over Time
description: A 60-second lesson on How Color Fades Over Time.

hook.text: Your favorite black T-shirt turns grey. The sun and your washing machine conspire.

buildup.text: UV light breaks chemical bonds in dye molecules, literally destroying color.

discovery.text: Detergents strip unfixed dye, and friction in the drum accelerates the loss.
